Course Description.text: Construction methods for civil and structural systems, design of temporary structures, safety, and building codes.

Course Description.text: Project delivery systems, construction contracts; estimating and scheduling; ethics and labor issues.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Selection of appropriate equipment based on operational parameters, principles of construction productivity measurement and analysis, process design, and discrete event simulation.

Course Description.text: Construction project estimating and bidding and the preparation of construction schedules, followed by in-depth coverage of time and cost control, and risk management.

Course Description.text: The preparation and development of a proposal and plan for a construction project, including construction engineering systems, site facilities, construction methods, coordination, leadership, and control.
